DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study examine effectiveness pharmaceutical care service management poorly control type 2 diabetes mellitus .
DOC.criteria: Patients visit Endocrinology Metabolism department Pusan National University Hospital , type 2 diabetes mellitus , meet one follow criterion Who diagnose type 2 diabetes mellitus first time Who need education medication disease Who poorly control blood glucose Who poor medication adherence Who hospitalize diabetes complication poorly control blood glucose Whose physician recommend pharmaceutical care Patients meet one follow criterion Who gestational diabetes Who able respond questionnaire Who severe condition cerebrovascular disease , mental disorder , acquire immune deficiency syndrome Who able followedup 9 month Pusan National University Hospital
